scripts.tailwind:prod: NODE_ENV=production tailwind build -i src/tailwind.css -c tailwind.config.js -o src/index.css
scripts.start: npm run tailwind:dev && BROWSER=none react-scripts start
scripts.prune: rm package-lock.json -f && rm node_modules -rf && npm i

scriptsComments.tailwind:dev: Generate a index.css file which contains all tailwind.css classes
scriptsComments.tailwind:prod: Generates a index.css which contains only used classes in the project
scriptsComments.start: Starts dev server and runs tailwind:dev concurrently
scriptsComments.build: Runs eslint (check for lint errors), run svelte-check (to check if there are typescript errors), generate the production tailwind.css file, finally use webpack to generate the static website in /build folder
scriptsComments.eslint: Run eslint, do not allow any warnings and errors
scriptsComments.update: Update all packages to the next major version
scriptsComments.prune: Remove node_modules folder, package-lock.json and re-generate both from package.json
